Name: Tweak's Troublemakers
Description: Tweak's Troublemakers are a rough and tumble group of misfits borne of the destruction of Faulkner's Freelancers. Run by Taryn 'Tweak' Wells-Karlsen, the Troublemakers take whatever contracts they can with their lance of BattleMechs and half-company of medium and heavy vehicles.
ReputationStatements: Glad we could work together on this one, Commander. I hope we can pull both our asses out of the fire.

MissionSuccessStatements: Damn fine work, Commander. From one mercenary commander to another, you've more than earned my respect.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You gave it your best, but sometimes a win just isn't in the cards. I get it, I've been there. Thanks for the effort, all the same.
BadFaithFailureStatements: That was disappointing as hell, Commander. If one of my MechWarriors dropped the ball as badly as you just did, I'd kick their ass from here back to Trell.
